data.name: Inception
data.plot: A skilled thief, who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO, but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

data.name: The Dark Knight
data.plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham. The Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

data.name: Interstellar
data.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth faces environmental collapse.

data.name: The Shawshank Redemption
data.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

data.name: The Avengers
data.cast: Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Evans,Scarlett Johansson,Mark Ruffalo
data.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

data.name: The Godfather
data.plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

data.name: Pulp Fiction
data.cast: John Travolta,Uma Thurman,Samuel L. Jackson,Bruce Willis
data.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

data.name: Forrest Gump
data.plot: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during many historic events - in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. Yet, despite all of his accomplishments, his one true love eludes him.

data.name: The Matrix
data.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

data.name: Goodfellas
data.cast: Robert De Niro,Ray Liotta,Joe Pesci,Lorraine Bracco
data.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

data.name: Seven Samurai
data.plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

data.name: Life Is Beautiful
data.plot: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses his humor to shield his son from the horrors of life in a concentration camp.

data.name: City Lights
data.plot: With the help of a sympathetic millionaire, a tramp falls in love with a beautiful blind flower girl.

data.name: Saving Private Ryan
data.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

data.name: The Green Mile
data.cast: Tom Hanks,Michael Clarke Duncan,David Morse,Bonnie Hunt
data.plot: The lives of guards on a U.S. death row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

data.name: Se7en
data.cast: Morgan Freeman,Brad Pitt,Kevin Spacey,Andrew Kevin Walker
data.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

data.name: The Silence of the Lambs
data.cast: Jodie Foster,Anthony Hopkins,Lawrence A. Bonney,Kasi Lemmons
data.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

data.name: Gladiator
data.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

data.name: Back to the Future
data.cast: Michael J. Fox,Christopher Lloyd,Lea Thompson,Thomas F. Wilson
data.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

data.name: Léon: The Professional
data.plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

data.name: The Lion King
data.cast: Matthew Broderick,Jeremy Irons,James Earl Jones,Jonathan Taylor Thomas
data.plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.
